body_html: Generally, doing it in phase and amplitude space is better because there are far fewer local minima, however then yes you have phase wrapping. If you do it in phase/amp space then you should solve phase first (mostly) before doing pase+amplitude. Phase errors are usually the most important. I'm curious what problem you are trying to solve?

body: Generally, doing it in phase and amplitude space is better because there are far fewer local minima, however then yes you have phase wrapping. If you do it in phase/amp space then you should solve phase first (mostly) before doing pase+amplitude. Phase errors are usually the most important. I'm curious what problem you are trying to solve?
